1280 
 
CULTURAL AND CREATIVE ART / IGBO  
 EBENEZER     
OTTO/IJANIKIN  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Fine Arts, Igbo and other Arts subject.   
  
Literature in English, Igbo and any two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
  
CULTURAL AND CREATIVE ART / POLITICAL  
SCIENCE  
 FC-ZARIA    
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government/History, Fine Arts/Music 
and one (1)   Social Science/Arts subject.  
Government/History and one (1) Arts, one (1)  Social 
Science subject.  
  
TIV/THEATRE ARTS  
 KAT-ALA           
 OJU    
      
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Literature in English and two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
  
Literature in English and two (2) Arts subjects.

KANO

HISTORY/FULFULDE 
SOKOTO  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government/History and one (1)  
Arts, one (1)   Social Science subject.  
  
Government/History, one (1)  Arts and one (1)   
Social Science subject.

AKWANGA 
ALVAN  
FC-OBUDU

Mathematics, Literature in English and two (2) Arts 
subject.  
  
Literature in English and two (2) Arts subjects.

As in Tiv/Theatre Arts.  
  
As in Tiv/Theatre Arts.

FC-YOLA

Mathematics, Islamic Studies and two (2)  Arts 
subjects.  
Islamic Studies and two (2) Arts subjects.
